Foundational cadet training • Excellence, discipline, leadership fundamentals • Structured classes, drill and ceremony, physical fitness, military exercises • Established disciplinary foundation & CAP structure understanding.

## Kentucky Wing Encampment {style="color: #2a5298; border-bottom: 3px solid #2a5298; padding-bottom: 8px;"}

**2025 | Wendell H. Ford Joint Training Center, Kentucky | Cadet Training Officer & Public Affairs Officer**

Developed & taught leadership classes to fellow cadets • Captured, edited, managed photography • Coordinated squadron communications & media efforts • Training delivery expertise & media relations experience.

## Ohio Wing Summer Encampment {style="color: #1e3c72; border-bottom: 3px solid #1e3c72; padding-bottom: 8px;"}

**2025 | Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio | ATS Flight Commander**

Led aerospace training flight in hands-on STEM activities • Rocket building & airplane simulator training • Full-motion C-17 simulator demonstration at WPAFB (1 of 2 Flight Commanders selected) • Advanced leadership experience with cutting-edge aerospace technology exposure.
